channel.title: Mealplan on Shelter's House
channel.description: Recent content in Mealplan on Shelter's House

item.title: Beautiful weekend
item.description: Last free weekend before Galvanize was wonderful! Thursday evening I headed over to Galvanize for an informal get together- saying HI before starting on Monday. I met Kiki, our class dog! Thursday night we headed out to Avanti for dinner. It was a gorgeous night, and we stopped by Prost first. It was so nice to sit outside and chat about life. Then we headed to Avanti, we sat downstairs, ordered some pizza for National pizza day, and went up to the roof for a little while.
